Field.FormMenuDescription: Positive Affect Negative Affect Scale - Expanded (PANAS-X) Scored
Field.ElementLabel: Please choose the time frame for this analysis:

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, right now (that is, at this present moment) 
 2, today 
 3, during the past few days 
 4, during the past week 
 5, during the past few weeks 
 6, during the past month 
 7, during the past year 
 8, in general

Field.ElementLabel:
PANAS-X

This scale consists of a number of words and phrases that describe different feelings and emotions. Read each item and then mark the appropriate answer in the space next to that word. Indicate to what extent you have felt this way [panasx_sc_timeframe]. Use the following scale to record your answers:

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, 1. Very slightly or not at all 
 2, 2. A little 
 3, 3. Moderately 
 4, 4. Quite a bit 
 5, 5. Extremely

StructuredValue.Value: 1. Very slightly or not at all

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([panasx_sc_afr],[panasx_sc_scar],[panasx_sc_nerv],[panasx_sc_jitt],[panasx_sc_guilt],[panasx_sc_ash],[panasx_sc_irrit],[panasx_sc_host],[panasx_sc_upset],[panasx_sc_diss])

Field.ElementNote: afraid, scared, nervous, jittery, guilty, ashamed, irritable, hostile, upset, distressed

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([panasx_sc_afr],[panasx_sc_scar],[panasx_sc_fright],[panasx_sc_nerv],[panasx_sc_jitt],[panasx_sc_shak])

Field.ElementNote: afraid, scared, frightened, nervous, jittery, shaky

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([panasx_sc_sad],[panasx_sc_blue],[panasx_sc_down],[panasx_sc_alon],[panasx_sc_lone])
sum([panasx_sc_guilt],[panasx_sc_ash],[panasx_sc_blame],[panasx_sc_ang],[panasx_sc_disgustself],[panasx_sc_disself])

Field.ElementNote: guilty, ashamed, blameworthy, angry at self, disgusted with self, dissatisfied with self

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([panasx_sc_angry],[panasx_sc_irrit],[panasx_sc_host],[panasx_sc_scorn],[panasx_sc_dis]+[panasx_sc_loath])

Field.ElementNote: angry, irritable, hostile, scornful, disgusted, loathing

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([panasx_sc_shy],[panasx_sc_bash],[panasx_sc_sheep],[panasx_sc_tim])
sum([panasx_sc_sleep],[panasx_sc_tired],[panasx_sc_slugg],[panasx_sc_drows])
sum([panasx_sc_act],[panasx_sc_alert],[panasx_sc_att],[panasx_sc_enthu],[panasx_sc_excit],[panasx_sc_insp],[panasx_sc_interest],[panasx_sc_prou],[panasx_sc_str],[panasx_sc_deter])

Field.ElementNote: active, alert, attentive, enthusiastic, excited, inspired, interested, proud, strong, determined

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([panasx_sc_cheer],[panasx_sc_happ],[panasx_sc_joy],[panasx_sc_delight],[panasx_sc_enthu],[panasx_sc_excit],[panasx_sc_live],[panasx_sc_energ])

Field.ElementNote: cheerful, happy, joyful, delighted, enthusiastic, excited, lively, energetic

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([panasx_sc_prou],[panasx_sc_str],[panasx_sc_confid],[panasx_sc_bold],[panasx_sc_fear],[panasx_sc_dar])

Field.ElementNote: proud, strong, confident, bold, fearless, daring

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([panasx_sc_alert],[panasx_sc_att],[panasx_sc_concent],[panasx_sc_deter])
sum([panasx_sc_calm],[panasx_sc_relax],[panasx_sc_ease])
sum([panasx_sc_surp],[panasx_sc_amaz],[panasx_sc_aston])
